SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.platform

Class GenericTransactionImportPDF

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.platform.GenericTransactionImportCsvPdfBase
grafioschtrader.platform.GenericTransactionImportPDF
Direct Known Subclasses:
CornerTraderTransactionImportPDF, MigrosTransactionImportPDF
public class GenericTransactionImportPDF extends GenericTransactionImportCsvPdfBase
Generic PDF transaction importer supporting individual PDFs, batch PDF processing, and GT-Transform files.

This class provides a universal PDF import solution that can handle transaction documents from most online brokers. It supports three distinct import workflows: individual PDF documents, multiple PDF batch processing, and GT-Transform text files containing multiple converted PDF documents. The importer uses template-based parsing to extract transaction data from PDF content converted to text format.

Import Workflows

Individual PDF Import

Processes single PDF documents (confirmations, statements) by:

  • Converting PDF to text using built-in PDF processing
  • Applying configurable text cleaning via cleanReadPDF(String)
  • Matching against available templates for transaction extraction
  • Creating import positions for successful matches

Batch PDF Processing

Handles multiple PDF files in a single operation, processing each document independently while maintaining consistent error handling and template matching across all files.

GT-Transform Import

Processes text files created by GT-PDF-Transform containing multiple converted PDF documents. The format uses file markers [fileNumber|filename] to separate individual documents within the batch file, enabling import of large historical transaction sets.

Template-Based Parsing

Uses TemplateConfigurationPDFasTXT templates that define:

  • Field extraction patterns using regular expressions
  • Data validation rules for transaction properties
  • Platform-specific formatting and layout recognition
  • Multi-line transaction parsing for complex documents

Enhanced Dividend Processing

Extends the base class functionality with automatic exchange rate calculation for dividend transactions involving currency conversion, ensuring accurate multi-currency portfolio tracking.

Customization

Platform-specific implementations can override cleanReadPDF(String) to apply custom text cleaning logic for PDF documents that require preprocessing before template matching.

  • Method Details

    • importMultiplePdfForm

      public void importMultiplePdfForm(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile[] uploadFiles, ImportTransactionPosJpaRepository importTransactionPosJpaRepository, SecurityJpaRepository securityJpaRepository, ImportTransactionPosFailedJpaRepository importTransactionPosFailedJpaRepository, Locale userLocale) throws Exception
      Imports transaction data from multiple PDF files in a single batch operation. Each PDF is processed independently using the same template matching logic, with errors isolated to individual files to prevent batch failures.
      Parameters:
      uploadFiles - Array of PDF files to process
      importTransactionPosJpaRepository - Repository for persisting successful import positions
      securityJpaRepository - Repository for resolving security instruments
      importTransactionPosFailedJpaRepository - Repository for recording failed import attempts
      userLocale - User's locale for number and date formatting
      Throws:
      Exception - if batch processing setup fails

    • importSinglePdfForm

      public void importSinglePdfForm(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile uploadFile, ImportTransactionPosJpaRepository importTransactionPosJpaRepository, SecurityJpaRepository securityJpaRepository, ImportTransactionPosFailedJpaRepository importTransactionPosFailedJpaRepository, Locale userLocale) throws Exception
      Imports transaction data from a single PDF document using template-based parsing. Converts the PDF to text, applies optional cleaning, and attempts to match against available templates to extract transaction information.
      Parameters:
      uploadFile - PDF file containing transaction data
      importTransactionPosJpaRepository - Repository for persisting successful import positions
      securityJpaRepository - Repository for resolving security instruments
      importTransactionPosFailedJpaRepository - Repository for recording failed import attempts
      userLocale - User's locale for number and date formatting
      Throws:
      Exception - if PDF processing or template matching fails

    • setCashaccountAndCheckReadyState

      protected void setCashaccountAndCheckReadyState(List<Cashaccount> cashaccountList, ImportTransactionPos importTransactionPos, ImportTransactionPosJpaRepository importTransactionPosJpaRepository)
      Enhanced cash account assignment with automatic exchange rate calculation for dividend transactions. Extends the base implementation to handle multi-currency dividend scenarios where exchange rates need to be determined automatically for accurate portfolio tracking.
      Overrides:
      setCashaccountAndCheckReadyState in class GenericTransactionImportCsvPdfBase
      Parameters:
      cashaccountList - Available cash accounts in the portfolio
      importTransactionPos - Import position to validate and prepare
      importTransactionPosJpaRepository - Repository for transaction validation and exchange rate calculation

    • cleanReadPDF

      protected String cleanReadPDF(String readPDFAsText)
      Hook method for applying custom text cleaning to PDF content before template matching. Platform-specific implementations can override this method to remove or modify text patterns that interfere with template parsing (headers, footers, formatting artifacts).
      Parameters:
      readPDFAsText - Raw text extracted from the PDF document
      Returns:
      Cleaned text ready for template matching

    • importGTTransform

      public void importGTTransform(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile uploadFile, ImportTransactionPosJpaRepository importTransactionPosJpaRepository, SecurityJpaRepository securityJpaRepository, ImportTransactionPosFailedJpaRepository importTransactionPosFailedJpaRepository, Locale userLocale)
      Imports transaction data from a GT-PDF-Transform text file containing multiple converted PDF documents. Processes the batch format where individual PDF documents are separated by file markers [fileNumber|filename] and handles each document as a separate transaction.
      Parameters:
      uploadFile - Text file from GT-PDF-Transform containing multiple PDF documents
      importTransactionPosJpaRepository - Repository for persisting import positions
      securityJpaRepository - Repository for resolving security instruments
      importTransactionPosFailedJpaRepository - Repository for recording failures
      userLocale - User's locale for number and date formatting
